--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, Kent Beck <kentb@...> wrote:
>
> I think th=
is would be a trivial change internally to JUnit. I'm not sure how many ext=
ernal tools have the "void only" assumption baked in and how many rely on J=
Unit for validation.

+1 for that change.

As it seems, most IDEs and tools=
 work fine with non-void test methods but fail on test methods with paramet=
ers. JExample only received bug reports regarding the latter.

--AA
